wikipedia_page.main: Paul James Scriven, Lord Scriven (born 7 February 1966) is a Liberal Democrat politician and former Leader of Sheffield City Council (2008–11), who was once described as Nick Clegg's "closest ally in local government".

response: *Lord Paul Scriven – Life Peer and former Leader of Sheffield City Council
